summary: THERE IS A HUGE SPACE OF TIME IN 3RD GEAR WHEN THE TRANSMISSION BASICALLY FEELS LIKE IT'S IN NEUTRAL AND WON'T RESPOND TO THROTTLE.  THE ENGINE REVS HIGHER BUT THE CAR DOES NOT MOVE WHILE IN MIDDLE OF MOTION.  THE REV RANGE WHEN IT HAPPENS IS BETWEEN IDLE (700RPM) AND 1300 RPM.  IT HAPPENS ALL THE TIME.*JB
